original_text: One cherub on the end on this side, and another cherub on the other end on that side: out of the mercy seat made he the cherubims on the two ends thereof.
korean_text: 한 그룹은 이쪽 끝에, 한 그룹은 저쪽 끝에 곧 속죄소와 한 덩이로 그 양쪽에 만들었으니

sentences.original_text: One cherub on the end on this side
and another cherub on the other end on that side
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 케룹이 저쪽 다른 끝에 있었다

sentences.original_text: out of the mercy seat made he the cherubims
